All our classes in poise, manners, dancing,

Thirty seconds, right here on the ground.

I can't.  I can't do it.
Yeah, of course you can--

I need two rows. Ladies on the pink line, gentlemen on the blue.
translation.es: Necesito dos filas. Señoritas, en la línea rosa, caballeros, en la azul.

translation.en: Welcome, everyone, to our joint dance class

translation.en: with Prince Charming Academy.
If we could keep the shrieking to a minimum,

translation.en: it would be much appreciated.
Hmm, it looks like we'll have one extra lady.
translation.es: Parece que tendremos una dama de más.

translation.en: Delancy, that's the pink line.
translation.es: Delancy, esa es la línea rosa.

translation.en: I just don't see Prince Nicholas.
He's the one I want to dance with.
Maybe he's invisible.
No daughter of mine sits on the sidelines at a dance.

Looks like you're going to have to sit out this one, dear. Pity.

Okay, come along. Gentlemen, please bow.

translation.en: Ladies, will you curtsey.
- Sorry I'm late... -
Oh, no! I'm so sorry.
It's okay.
No, it's not. I feel awful. Please.
translation.es: No, no lo está. Me siento muy mal. Por favor.

translation.en: Thank you.
Sorry. I didn't mean to be late.

translation.en: That's fine. The two of you can partner up and join the dance.

translation.en: Now, gentlemen, lightly kiss the top of your partner's hand...

translation.en: And dance.
Milady, I am Nicholas, young swain from the east,
translation.es: Milady, soy Nicholas, joven cortesano del este,

translation.en: most privileged to make your acquaintance.
Think that was polite enough?
Absolutely.
Think you can top it?
I, kind swain, am Blair, maiden of Gardania,

translation.en: honored above all to be welcomed into your swaininess.
translation.es: es un honor que me haga partícipe de su cortesía.

translation.en: - Well done. - I try.
Wonderful, everyone!
Wonderful, now a final bow and curtsey to your partners,

translation.en: of Prince Charming Academy.
Keeping in mind that you will see them again

As will I, good sir.
I have an exciting announcement.
Thanks to the generosity of Dame Devin,

To prepare for this event, you'll all have the afternoon

Your princess assistants
will help you take advantage of all the amenities.

translation.en: Enjoy.
Wickellia.
Top thing you've always wanted to see in the palace that you can't wait to see.

translation.en: Blair, go.

translation.es: con la reina Isabella y su familia.

Emily would love that story.

translation.es: pero no se ha visto desde entonces.

These are beautiful.
Thanks.
We should go.

Every one is in shreds!
What are we going to do?

translation.en: And if we skip a class, we get an F.

translation.en: We can't fail!
Coronation Day is two days away!

Seriously? It was Delancy. It had to be.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Fue Delancy. Tuvo que haber sido.

translation.en: She's the queen of Make Blair Feel Inferior.

No one can make you feel inferior.
Not without your consent.
We're princesses, right?
We don't even have our crowns yet. And you...

translation.es: No me refiero a las coronas, sino al carácter.

translation.en: Currently they're a little too breezy.
translation.es: En este momento, están un poco informales.

translation.en: Hmm. They just need a little alteration.
Grace! Caprice! Harmony!
Won't that make them breezier?
Hmm. It seems Blair, Hadley, and Isla are running late.
translation.es: Parece que Blair, Hadley e Isla llegarán tarde.

translation.en: I do hope they're not skipping class.
translation.es: Espero que no falten a clase.

translation.en: I'd hate to fail anyone so close to Coronation Day.

translation.en: Well, time's up.
Oh, come now, Dame Devin.
I think we can wait a few minutes more.
translation.es: Creo que podemos esperar unos minutos más.

That hardly seems fair.
I'm afraid we'll have to fail all three of them.

translation.en: Wait!
What do you think you're wearing?
Those aren't school- issued uniforms.
translation.es: Esos no son los uniformes de la escuela.

translation.en: Forgive me, madam, but they are, in fact,
made entirely from the material in our original uniforms.
translation.es: íntegramente del material de nuestros uniformes originales.

translation.es: el código de vestimenta no prohíbe en ningún lado lo que han hecho.

translation.en: Right. We just used some hard work to unlock our princess potential.

Come, join the class.
Awesome!
Where did you get new uniforms?
Those are amazing!
We made them. Blair made them.
translation.es: - Los hicimos nosotras. - Blair los hizo.

translation.en: How did you do that?
I want one.
I didn't know people made clothes.

translation.en: I thought they came from elves. You know, like toast.

translation.en: Attention, everyone.
Welcome to the royal palace of Gardania.

translation.es: Como regalo especial, tendrán tiempo antes de la comida

translation.es: para explorar el primer piso del palacio.

translation.en: Enjoy!
Sweet. Royal secrets, here we come!
No way.
Blair. It's a picture of Blair.
That's not possible.
Why would there be a portrait of me?
Princess Isabella, age 18.
That dog.
It couldn't be!
Queen Isabella, King Reginald, the Princess Sophia, and their loyal dog,
translation.es: Reina Isabella, rey Reginald, princesa Sophia y su perro fiel,

translation.en: Prince.
No way!
Blair? Do you know when your mom found you on her doorstep?
translation.es: Blair, ¿sabes cuándo te encontró tu mamá en su puerta?

translation.en: The date? Sure.
I mean, she made it my birthday since she didn't know my real one.
translation.es: Hizo que fuera mi cumpleaños porque no sabía el verdadero.

translation.en: April 26th.
What?
Blair, you know what April 26th is, don't you?
translation.es: Blair, sabes qué día es el 26 de abril, ¿no?

translation.en: Um, yeah.
My birthday. I just said that.
It's the day the royal family died in that car crash.
translation.es: Es el día que la familia real murió en ese accidente de tránsito.

translation.en: I'm thinking maybe baby Sophia didn't die in that crash.
translation.es: Creo que tal vez la bebé Sophia no murió en el accidente.

translation.en: Maybe she was found and left on someone's doorstep.
translation.es: Tal vez la encontraron y la dejaron en la puerta de alguien.

translation.en: No!
Yes, look at the portrait.
translation.es: - No. - ¡Sí! Mire el retrato, eres idéntica a la reina Isabella.

translation.en: You look exactly like Queen Isabella!
translation.es: Mire el retrato, eres idéntica a la reina Isabella.

translation.en: You could be baby Sophia.
If it's true, and Dame Devin and Delancy know it,
translation.es: Si es cierto, y Dama Devin y Delancy lo saben,

translation.en: that would explain why they're so awful to you,
translation.es: eso explicaría por qué te tratan tan mal,

translation.en: because you're the rightful heir to the throne, and not Delancy!
translation.es: ¡porque tú eres la heredera legítima al trono y no Delancy!

translation.en: Okay. That's the craziest thing I've ever heard.
translation.es: Bien, eso es lo más loco que he oído.

translation.en: Dinner time! We've gotta go.
This is serious, you know.
The whole fate of Gardania is at stake.
translation.es: El destino de Gardania está en juego.

translation.en: Come on, you guys. It's crazy.
Excuse me!
My daughter has a declaration
translation.es: Mi hija tiene una declaración sobre cómo manejará las cosas

translation.en: about how she'll handle things when she's crowned princess
translation.es: Mi hija tiene una declaración sobre cómo manejará las cosas cuando la coronen princesa en dos días.

translation.en: in two days.
translation.es: cuando la coronen princesa en dos días.

translation.en: Delancy!
I, um...
My brilliant daughter noticed that Gardania's poorer sections
translation.es: Mi brillante hija notó que las áreas más pobres de Gardania son una mancha

translation.en: are a blight to the otherwise beautiful community.
translation.es: que las áreas más pobres de Gardania son una mancha en la hermosa comunidad.

translation.en: - - Hey!
To remedy this she will take over those areas,
translation.es: Para remediarlo, se apropiará de esas áreas,

translation.en: bulldoze the buildings, and turn the land into beautiful rolling parks,
translation.es: demolerá los edificios y convertirá la tierra en hermosos parques ondulantes

translation.en: full of trees and grass, and streams.
translation.es: llenos de árboles, hierba y arroyos.

translation.en: Wonderful for the environment.
But people live in those areas you just knocked down.
translation.es: Pero vive gente en las áreas que acaban de derribar.

translation.en: My neighborhood is there.
It is?
Delancy is aware of that.
Those people will move elsewhere.
translation.es: Esa gente se mudará a otra parte.

translation.en: How? They're like me.
They don't have money. They can't just pick up and move.
translation.es: No tienen dinero. No pueden mudarse así como así.

translation.en: If I were you I'd leave this school immediately
translation.es: Si fuera tú, me iría de aquí de inmediato

translation.en: and get my family ready to move.
translation.es: y prepararía a mi familia para mudarse.

translation.en: Delancy?
I think it is disgraceful.
Duly noted.
Now, shall we continue our lesson in dinner manners?
translation.es: Ahora, ¿continuamos nuestra clase de modales en la mesa?

translation.en: Right, then, students, we will start with our salads.
translation.es: Bien, alumnas, empezaremos con las ensaladas.

translation.en: Outermost forks. You may begin.
Let's go.
Blair, are you okay?
I'm better than okay.
I'm ready.
Ready for what?
To fight.
If Delancy gets on the throne she's going to ruin my family,
translation.es: Si Delancy llega al trono, arruinará a mi familia

translation.en: and probably this kingdom along with it.
If she gets on the throne?
She can't, if we can prove someone else is the rightful heir.
translation.es: No podrá si demostramos que la heredera legítima es otra.

translation.en: Gardania's magical crown.
It must be in the palace. Right?
The crown glows when placed on the true heir of Gardania.
translation.es: La corona brilla al ponérsela a la verdadera heredera de Gardania.

translation.en: But we have to find it before Delancy's coronation.
translation.es: Pero debemos encontrarla antes de la coronación de Delancy.

translation.en: So we have to find the crown...
translation.es: Así que debemos encontrar la corona…

translation.en: Tonight.
It's time.
Do we have everything we need?
Game on.
What's that?
What's going on?
Fire drill! Fire drill! There's no time! Single file! In a line!
translation.es: ¡Simulacro de incendio! ¡No hay tiempo! ¡Una sola fila, en fila!

translation.en: Hmm. I don't see a fire drill on the schedule.
translation.es: No veo un simulacro de incendio en el programa.

translation.en: What about the plan?
We wait a little longer.
Hopefully, this will be fast.
Lovely day for a surprise fire drill, isn't it, darling?
translation.es: Lindo día para un simulacro de incendio sorpresa, ¿no, cariño?

translation.en: Mom, what did you do?
Oh! What have you done to your uniform?
I like it, Mother.
Ugh! Come on. Let's join the others outside.
translation.es: Ven. Vamos con las demás afuera.

translation.en: Attention, students! You may now return to your rooms!
translation.es: Atención, alumnas, pueden regresar a sus habitaciones.

translation.en: How much time did we lose?
Thirty minutes.
Plus another 15 minutes trying to untangle Portia from the tether ball pole.
translation.es: Más otros 15 minutos tratando de desenredar a Portia del poste de tetherball.

translation.en: Let's go.
Thieves! They're thieves, I tell you.
Arrest them.
What?
I'm sure it's some kind of mistake,
translation.es: Estoy segura de que es un error,

translation.en: but Dame Devin believes you stole her jewelry.
translation.es: pero la Dama Devin cree que le robaste sus joyas.

translation.en: No! I would never!
Not to save your poor family about to lose their home?
translation.es: ¿Ni para salvar a tu pobre familia a punto de perder su hogar?

translation.en: I doubt that.
Plus my daughter, Delancy, saw you.
translation.es: Además, mi hija Delancy te vio.

translation.en: Didn't you tell me you saw Blair poking around in my office the other day?
translation.es: ¿No me dijiste que viste a Blair husmeando en mi oficina el otro día?

translation.en: I don't...
I don't remember exactly, but...
Yes. Yes, I did.
I demand you search their room.
What?
Girls, it's procedure.
If you have nothing to hide, it shouldn't matter.
translation.es: Si no tienen nada que ocultar, no debería haber problema.

translation.en: Look what I found.
My jewelry!
That's not...
I didn't put that there.
Here's another.
No way!
One more.
We didn't steal anything.
Don't lie. It's unbecoming.
Lock them up.
Headmistress Privet, I promise you.
With the evidence and the witness I'm afraid I have no choice.
translation.es: Con las pruebas y la testigo, temo que no tengo opción.

translation.en: Brock, take them to the detaining room.
translation.es: Brock, llévalas a la sala de detención.

translation.en: No!
We can't investigate until after the ceremony tomorrow.
translation.es: Recién podremos investigar mañana después de la ceremonia.

translation.en: You will remain detained until that time.
Detained?
As in, locked up?
During the coronation?
I'm afraid so.
Unless there is another way to explain this.
translation.es: A menos que haya otra forma de explicar esto.

translation.en: How very disappointing.
I'll say.
Brock!
Isla, Hadley, I'm so sorry.
Now neither of you will become princesses.
translation.es: Ahora ninguna de las dos se convertirá en princesa.

translation.en: Don't sweat it.
Who needs a tiara anyway?
They just make your head itch.
translation.es: Te dan picazón en la cabeza.

translation.en: And it's not easy to kick a ball in four- inch heels.
translation.es: Y no es fácil patear una pelota con tacones de diez centímetros.

translation.en: Brock, stop!
I've got something else in mind for the prisoners.
translation.es: Tengo otra cosa en mente para las prisioneras.

translation.en: You may turn them over to me.
But my orders...
Will officially come from me in only a few hours.
translation.es: Te las daré yo oficialmente en unas pocas horas.

translation.en: The keys?
They're all yours.
Thank you. You may go.
If this is your way or rubbing it in, you don't have to.
translation.es: Si esta es tu manera de restregármelo, no hace falta.

translation.en: You've won.
Yeah, we get it.
- - What are you--
I'm supposed to be asleep.
Tell me,
are you really Princess Sophia?
I... I don't know for sure.
translation.es: Yo… No lo sé con seguridad,

translation.en: But I think so.
I think so, too.
This is a map of the palace basement.
translation.es: Este es un mapa del sótano del palacio.

translation.en: There's something of yours inside the vault.
translation.es: Hay algo tuyo dentro de la bóveda.

translation.en: Gardania's magical crown?
You have to get it.
Let everyone know the truth before coronation.
translation.es: Que todos sepan la verdad antes de la coronación.

translation.en: Once I'm crowned, it's too late.
Gardania's mine for life.
translation.es: Gardania será mía de por vida.

translation.en: You don't want that?
I want what's right.
I have to get back. My mother will be looking for me.
translation.es: Tengo que volver. Mi madre debe estar buscándome.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll leave a window open for you on the third floor.
translation.es: Te dejaré una ventana abierta en el tercer piso.

translation.en: Good luck.
Hey, Prince.
Aw, don't look at me like that.
I can't play fetch, I'm on duty.
translation.es: No puedo tirarte la pelota, estoy de servicio.

translation.en: Hey!
Prince. Prince. No, no. Prince, come here. I gotta work.
translation.es: Príncipe. No, Príncipe, ven aquí. ¡Tengo que trabajar!

translation.en: Prince. Prince. Come on.
Come here.
That's the window.
Let's hope Delancy did what she said she would.
translation.es: Esperemos que Delancy haya hecho lo que dijo que haría.

translation.en: You're sure this will work?
Positive! Just hold on tight and don't look down.
translation.es: Segurísima. Agárrate fuerte y no mires hacia abajo.

translation.en: Come. Come on. Come on.
Come on.
Prince, hey.
Drop it. Drop it. Drop it.
Come back here!
The elevator should be right down this hall.
translation.es: El ascensor debería estar al final del pasillo.

translation.en: It's time for you to be asleep, Delancy.
translation.es: Es hora de que te duermas, Delancy.

translation.en: You've a big day tomorrow.
Don't move.
What now?
Laser alarm. We've got 'em at home.
translation.es: Alarma láser. Tenemos de esas en casa.

translation.en: If we break the beams, alarms go off.
translation.es: Si cruzamos un rayo, se activarán las alarmas.

translation.en: I can't see any beams.
Perhaps a little touch up will help.
translation.es: Tal vez ayude un pequeño retoque.

translation.en: Nice.
So, how good are you guys at gymnastics?
I do a mean tree pose.
I think I can do a somersault.
translation.es: Creo que puedo hacer un salto mortal.

translation.en: Follow me.
No! This way.
Careful!
Huh? Okay.
No, no. Whoa!
Welcome, Dame Devin. Your security is our priority.
translation.es: Bienvenida, Dama Devin. Su seguridad es nuestra prioridad.

translation.en: Please enter your password.
Password?
Try something. What would Dame Devin choose?
translation.es: Prueba con algo. ¿Qué elegiría la Dama Devin?

translation.en: Delancy's coronation day?
translation.es: ¿La fecha de la coronación de Delancy?

translation.en: Today's date.
You seem to be having trouble.
Would you like your password hint?
Yes.
Your hint is, The day it all fell into place.
translation.es: La pista es: El día que todo se acomodó.

translation.en: Ten seconds until your lockdown.
- The day it all fell into place? - Nine, eight... - What does that mean? - ...seven, six...
translation.es: ¿El día que todo se acomodó? ¿Qué significa eso?

translation.en: Wait. The day it all fell into place.
translation.es: Espera. El día que todo se acomodó.

translation.en: The day Dame Devin's plans started working.
translation.es: El día que los planes de Dama Devin empezaron a funcionar.

translation.en: The day of the car crash.
Thank you, Dame Devin.
Enjoy.
Not in here!
Hadley, Isla, look!
Gardania's magical crown!
How do we get it out of the case?
You won't.
But I shouldn't have too much trouble with it.
translation.es: Pero a mí no me costará mucho.

translation.en: Goodbye, Blair.
Enjoy Coronation Day.
translation.es: Disfruten del día de la coronación.

translation.en: No!
That's it. We're sunk.
Well, Phil, here it is. The day we've all been waiting for!
translation.es: Bueno, Phil, ya llegó. El día que todos hemos estado esperando.

translation.en: My birthday?
No, it's Coronation Day.
translation.es: No, es el día de la coronación.

translation.en: Even now, our beloved princesses- in- training
are pulling into the royal palace to receive their royal crowns
translation.es: están entrando al palacio real para recibir sus coronas reales

translation.en: on their royal heads.
Ladies and gentlemen!
I welcome you to our annual Graduation
translation.es: les doy la bienvenida a la graduación anual y día de coronación…

translation.en: - and Coronation Day... - This will be the best
translation.es: les doy la bienvenida a la graduación anual y día de coronación… Este será el mejor día de coronación de la historia, ¿no crees?

translation.en: Coronation Day ever, don't you think?
translation.es: Este será el mejor día de coronación de la historia, ¿no crees?

translation.en: Grace, go find Miss Privet and tell her where we are.
translation.es: Grace, ve a buscar a la señorita Privet y dile dónde estamos.

translation.en: Now, what are we going to do?
You are hereby dubbed Lady Royal Josette of Zinnia.
translation.es: Por el presente acto, te nombro dama de la realeza Josette de Zinnia.

translation.en: You are hereby dubbed Princess Miranda of Philadelphia.
translation.es: Por el presente acto, te nombro princesa Miranda de Filadelfia.

translation.en: You are hereby dubbed Princess Portia of Narcissia.
translation.es: Por el presente acto, te nombro princesa Portia de Narcissia.

translation.en: Ugh! There is no service at all down here.
Hmm. What's this?
Stand back!
If only there was a keypad inside the vault.
translation.es: Si tan solo hubiera un teclado numérico en la bóveda.

translation.en: Maybe there is!
Standing before me now is Delancy Devin,
translation.es: De pie frente a mí, está Delancy Devin,

translation.en: who will now govern our beloved and flourishing country, Gardania.
translation.es: que ahora gobernará nuestro amado y próspero país, Gardania.

translation.en: Delancy, I now crown you
translation.es: Delancy, ahora te corono princesa de…

translation.en: - Princess of... - Wait!
translation.es: Delancy, ahora te corono princesa de… ¡Espere!

translation.en: Uh... Proper princess protocol!
The bylaws state that before a new princess can be crowned,
translation.es: El estatuto dice que antes de coronar a una nueva princesa,

translation.en: the entire assembly must spin around seven times,
translation.es: todos los asistentes deben girar siete veces

translation.en: in honor of the seven hills of Gardania.
translation.es: en honor a las siete colinas de Gardania.

translation.en: I don't know.
What are you doing? You need to be crowned!
I just... Uh... Want to do it properly.
Spin, you say?
It is indeed proper protocol.
In honor of the seven hills of Gardania,
translation.es: ¡En honor a las siete colinas de Gardania,

translation.en: let us rise and spin around seven times!
- - I got it!
The phone's linked up with the keypad.
translation.es: El teléfono está conectado al teclado.

translation.en: Day of the car crash.
Ugh! Dame Devin must have changed the code.
translation.es: Dama Devin debe haber cambiado el código.

translation.en: You're right!
I heard Dame Devin change it when the doors were closing.
translation.es: Oí que lo cambió cuando cerraron las puertas.

translation.en: I heard it too!
That's what I've been humming this whole time.
translation.es: Eso es lo que estuve tarareando todo este tiempo.

translation.en: Let me see the phone.
Do, re, mi...
I got it!
- Woo! - Yes!
We did it!
Now, hop on one foot to honor those who have hopped before us.
translation.es: Ahora, salten en un pie para honrar a los que saltaron antes que nosotros.

translation.en: Bless you.
Hey! What are you doing here?
And now everyone must pat his head and rub his stomach at the same time.
translation.es: Y ahora todas dense palmadas en la cabeza y frótense la panza al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: Enough!
The protocols have been satisfied! Crown her!
translation.es: Ya se ha cumplido con el protocolo. ¡Corónala!

translation.en: Wait!
No! Do not wait!
I am making a claim to the throne, because I am Princess Sophia,
translation.es: Reclamo el trono porque soy la princesa Sophia,

translation.en: daughter of Queen Isabella!
You know, there is a resemblance.
This is ridiculous!
The princess died 17 years ago.
Finish the coronation
and make Princess Delancy ruler of Gardania for life!
translation.es: y nombra a la princesa Delancy gobernante de Gardania de por vida.

translation.en: Dame Devin, this is a serious claim and we have to...
translation.es: Dama Devin, esta es una afirmación seria y tenemos que…

translation.en: We have to crown my daughter.
Come on!
Oh! Get away!
It is Princess Sophia!
You useless child!
Do you have any idea what you've done?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea de lo que has hecho?

translation.en: I eliminated Queen Isabella so you could be princess one day.
translation.es: ¡Eliminé a la reina Isabella para que algún día fueras princesa!

translation.en: No, that's not what I meant.
Guards, please take her away.
No! You can't do this to me!
Get your hands off me!
You have to crown Delancy! You have to!
translation.es: Tienes que coronar a Delancy. ¡Tienes que hacerlo!

translation.en: You'll pay for this!
Blair... That is, Princess Sophia,
is there anything you would like to say to your new subjects?
translation.es: ¿te gustaría decirle algo a tus nuevos súbditos?

translation.en: Hello.
I'm just a regular girl.
But I think Headmistress Privet is right
translation.es: Pero creo que la directora tiene razón

translation.en: when she says every girl has princess potential.
translation.es: cuando dice que toda chica tiene potencial para ser princesa.

translation.en: It is an honor to be your princess.
translation.es: Es un honor ser su princesa.

translation.en: Blair, this is when the Princess of Gardania
translation.es: Blair, ahora es cuando la princesa de Gardania

translation.en: chooses her lady royal.
translation.es: elige a su dama de la realeza.

translation.en: Now, I know it's an important decision, so if you need more time, then...
translation.es: Sé que es una decisión importante, así que si necesitas más tiempo…

translation.en: I already know who I want.
It would be an incredible privilege if my lady royal could be...
translation.es: Sería un privilegio increíble si mi dama de la realeza pudiera ser…

translation.en: Delancy.
But Blair, why me?
I was horrible to you.
I wouldn't be wearing this crown without your help.
translation.es: No me habría puesto esta corona sin tu ayuda.

translation.en: Will you accept?
I would be honored, Your Highness.
Lady Royal Delancy of Gardania.
translation.es: Dama de la realeza Delancy de Gardania.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, royals of all ages,
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, miembros de la realeza de todas las edades

translation.en: - - and dogs,
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, miembros de la realeza de todas las edades y perros, ¡es hora de festejar!

translation.en: it's time to party!
Here's a special track I wrote myself.
translation.es: Esta es una canción especial que escribí yo.

translation.en: Hope you like it!
♪ All of us ♪
♪ Fabulous ♪
♪ Put your hands in the air All of us ♪
♪ We rule, we rule this school ♪
translation.es: Somos los mejores, los mejores de la escuela.

translation.en: ♪ We rule it We rule it ♪
♪ All of us ♪ Fabulous ♪
♪ And this is how we do it ♪
translation.es: Y así es como lo hacemos.

translation.en: No way! You're spinning your tunes?
It was totally time.
I love it!
Hey, Blair, don't look now, but look now.
translation.es: Blair, no mires ahora, pero mira ahora.

translation.en: Congratulations, Princess... Um...
You can call me Blair.
Congratulations on your coronation, too, Prince Nicholas.
translation.es: Felicitaciones también por tu coronación, príncipe Nicholas.

translation.en: Wouldst thou do me the honor of a dance?
translation.es: ¿Me concedería el honor de bailar conmigo?

translation.en: I would be most delighted.
♪ Jump up, hands in the air ♪
♪ Crowns on our head, lighter than air ♪
translation.es: Coronas en la cabeza, ligeras como el aire.

translation.en: ♪ Come on, now, spin to the left ♪
translation.es: Vamos, ahora, giren a la izquierda, giren a la derecha.

translation.en: ♪ Spin to the right, we're graduating ♪
translation.es: Vamos, ahora, giren a la izquierda, giren a la derecha. Nos graduamos,

translation.en: ♪ And it's our night ♪
♪ We rule this school ♪
translation.es: Somos los mejores de la escuela.

translation.en: ♪ We rule this school ♪
translation.es: Somos los mejores de la escuela.

translation.en: ♪ It's friendship that makes us strong ♪
translation.es: La amistad es lo que nos hace fuertes.

translation.en: ♪ And we all belong ♪ ♪ Yeah, we all belong ♪
translation.es: Y todos encajamos. Sí, todos encajamos.

translation.en: ♪ We rule this school ♪
translation.es: Somos los mejores de la escuela.

translation.en: Your Highness? There are some important people here to see you.
translation.es: ¿Su alteza? Vinieron a verte unas personas importantes.

translation.en: Emily! Mom!
Blair!
Welcome to our new home!
Really? We get to live in the palace?
We do.
Oh, Blair.
I know it's not exactly the place we dreamed about...
translation.es: Sé que no es exactamente el lugar con el que soñamos…

translation.en: Are you kidding? It's better than anything we ever dreamed about!
translation.es: ¿Bromeas? Es mejor que cualquier cosa que hayamos soñado.

translation.en: It is now that the two of you are here.
translation.es: Lo es ahora que ustedes dos están aquí.

translation.en: Blair?
If you're a princess now, does that mean I'm a princess, too?
translation.es: Si tú eres una princesa ahora, ¿significa que yo también lo soy?

translation.en: Of course.
There is a princess in every girl.
translation.es: Hay una princesa en cada chica.

translation.en: Come on. I wanna introduce you to everyone!
♪ Jump up, hands in the air ♪
♪ Crowns on our head, lighter than air ♪
translation.es: Coronas en la cabeza, ligeras como el aire.

translation.en: ♪ Come on, now, spin to the left ♪
translation.es: Vamos, ahora, giren a la izquierda, giren a la derecha.

translation.en: ♪ Spin to the right, we're graduating ♪
translation.es: Vamos, ahora, giren a la izquierda, giren a la derecha. Nos graduamos,

translation.en: ♪ And it's our night ♪
♪ You can see it in her flair ♪
translation.es: HAY UNA PRINCESA EN CADA CHICA. BARBIE

translation.en: ♪ She'll turn the world around ♪
translation.es: HAY UNA PRINCESA EN CADA CHICA. BARBIE Subtítulos: Adriana Celeste Silva
